name: A Tiny and Very Clumsy Baby Searches for Good Food in Dangerous Places
name_original: A Tiny and Very Clumsy Baby Searches for Good Food in Dangerous Places
description:
This is my first actual release ever, and it's really just a prototype to an idea I was really into. The idea of a difficult vertical platformer based on rotational platforming is a somewhat underutilized genre.

  • Play as an exceptionally clumsy baby who is searching for something delicious to eat in precarious environments. 
  • Jump, wallkick, and flap your way to food that this babboo probably shouldn't be eating on a healthy diet. 
  • With moderately dangerous cliffs and punishing falls this bebo has to watch out for bonks on the noggin. 
  • Race against the clock and avoid head trauma as a clumsy, incredibly hungry, birbo.
  • Did you play that one funny climbing mountain with hammer game and think "WOW, THIS REALLY NEEDS MORE BIRD AND LOWER FIDELITY ART"? Great this might be for you. (probably?)
